name: Dripos
headline: The only piece of software a coffee shop needs to operate.
description: Dripos is the only piece of software a coffee shop needs to run their business. We offer point of sale, employee scheduling, mobile ordering, and more to the 100,000 cafes in the United States.

###### Meet Dripos
# Operating System for|
[Get Started](https://dripos.com/<https:/dripos.typeform.com/get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c629821a8db6506f_Doodle-5-Dark.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/6068f1641e21c7507aeaff1c_DripRegister.png)
###### Testimonial
# A quick memo from a happy customer.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c6298266a0b65058_Doodle-Left-1-White.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/601c7772990daae7be64cab2_Screen%20Shot%202021-02-04%20at%204.37.52%20PM.jpg)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c629823e0db6506d_icon-play.svg)](https://dripos.com/<#>)
Carlos Falcon, owner of Grace Coffee Co. (8 locations)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/65036833090280c45a4d78d9_Asset%2015.png)
### The only software you'll ever need.
#### Before Dripos.
Our customers tried everything; Square, Clover, Toast, Homebase, Quickbooks, QR code ordering, Belly, Ritual, Jolt, integration after integration, etc.
#### After Dripos.
One intuitive app for your POS, mobile orders, marketing, team management & payroll, and more. It's the only piece of software you'll ever need to operate. 
#### The dream POS for a Coffee Shop.
We asked operators one simple question: what‚Äôs your dream point of sale? Then, we worked side by side with some of the best minds in the industry to build it. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c62982d019b64f7b_Illustration%203a.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c629821a97b6503a_icon-gallery-dark.svg)
#### Order System
Accept orders from all the platforms customers prefer. Offer register, mobile app, website, kiosk, and delivery.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c629824cbbb6503b_icon-id-dark.svg)
#### Management
Manage your entire business with one intuitive app. Team scheduling, marketing, payroll, and everything in between.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c62982d597b65046_icon-switcher-white.svg)
#### Administrative
Integrated analytics, branded expense cards, a full accounting software, and more. All included inside of dripos.
###### Order System
### A single menu that syncs between all ordering platforms.
Gain full access to beautiful ordering platforms branded specifically for your business. Third party ordering integrations don't sync together resulting in incorrect items, pricing differences, and customers placing orders they shouldn't. Dripos fixes this by syncing all of our in-house platforms to one backend menu. 
##### [In-StoreSetup registers & self service kiosks.](https://dripos.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)##### [Mobile AppDedicated customer ordering app.](https://dripos.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)##### [Online orderingBranded online ordering website.](https://dripos.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)##### [DeliveryAccept orders on your own channels.](https://dripos.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/60690864b9a18528ebe0f8cd_Drip-OrderSystem1.png)
Serve customers with a POS and kiosk.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5ebd97d8e6f6e1584cf81e9f_Drip-Mobile-App.jpg)
Order ahead, rewards, gift cards, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/60690ef625efbe2248c52ef0_Drip-OrderSystem3.png)
Your own website, included at no extra cost.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/60691688af95c22f18233f83_Drip-OrderSystem4.png)
Dispatch through your own drivers or our network.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/6503687644ededf8f12e57bb_Layer%201.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5ebb506c98efb02ee4e042ec_whitearrow.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/606918e0af95c2efb72345ac_Drip-Tickets-POS.png)
‚ÄúWe completely eliminated the printer from our shop.‚Äù**Omar Lopez, Cafe Social**
###### Order System
#### One place for all incoming orders.
Route orders from your POS, Website, Kiosk, and App to our KDS system built to organize your BOH. Add printers for extra clarity when needed. Plus, we even integrate your 3rd party delivery orders!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c6298242feb6504d_icon-gallery-white.svg)
Say goodbye to cluttered tickets.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c629826aebb6504b_icon-id-white.svg)
**Customers receive updates during prep.**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c62982d597b65046_icon-switcher-white.svg)
**Sync screens together for full customization.**
###### Management
#### An entire manager in your pocket.
All the tools you need to run your business on the go; detailed reports, team schedule, team communication, invoices, hiring, and much more. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5ebc4dfe760680f95e2d8eaa_Drip-App-Manage.jpg)
**All of your data, in one place.**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c629824cbbb6503b_icon-id-dark.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c62982d597b65046_icon-switcher-white.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/6069d53504d7b921ca80cf07_Drip-Management.png)
###### Management
### Powerful tools.
#### Administrative tasks
Dripos is more than just a POS, access a complete employee management system, accounting, and more. Ditch all the integrations!
#### Daily operations
Power your business with loyalty, automatic inventory, daily checklists, and more.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5ebda05e985520cd247fd21f_Drip-CafeDiem.png)](https://dripos.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)
### ‚ÄúGoing from Square to Dripos has been a great decision for our business.‚Äù
Sara Volkmann,Cafe Diem - 4x locations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/650368c3389c459a034a0c15_Asset%206.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb9a4482a774a58e25a1a8d/5eb9a448c629825451b65080_Doodle-10-Dark.svg)

### Dripos: The All-in-One Software Solution for Coffee Shops

**Founded:** 2019  
**Location:** New York, NY  
**Team:** 35 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S20  
**Website:** [dripos.com](https://dripos.com)

**Tags:** Fintech, SaaS  

---

**Mission Statement:**  
Dripos aims to be the only software any coffee shop will need to operate efficiently. 

Imagine running a caf√© where everything is streamlined under one roof. That's what Dripos is all about. This company provides an all-encompassing software platform that combines point-of-sale (POS), employee scheduling, mobile ordering, marketing, and business management‚Äîtailored specifically for the 100,000 coffee shops across the United States. 

#### What Makes Dripos Stand Out?

**One Integrated System:**  
Dripos isn't just a POS. While traditional systems separate functions and create the need for cumbersome integrations, Dripos pulls everything into one intuitive app. This means no more juggling multiple software solutions that don‚Äôt talk to each other‚Äîeverything from team management to marketing is housed in a single place.

**Empowering Coffee Shops:**  
The team behind Dripos consulted directly with caf√© operators to build the ideal POS solution. They learned what features were missing from existing market players like Square, Clover, and Toast, and set out to create a solution that meets all the needs of today‚Äôs coffee shops in real time.

**Customer-Centric Features:**  
From offering mobile ordering to managing crew schedules, Dripos allows cafes to accept orders through various channels (in-store, mobile app, website, kiosks, and delivery) while ensuring everything syncs back to a centralized menu. This efficiency translates to fewer errors and happier customers. 

**Innovative Management Tools:**  
The software comes packed with detailed analytics, automated inventory management, payroll capabilities, and customizable reporting. It‚Äôs basically an entire management team right in your pocket! 

#### Why Caf√©s Love Dripos

Testimonials from satisfied clients like Carlos Falcon of Grace Coffee Co and Sara Volkmann of Cafe Diem highlight how transitioning to Dripos has dramatically improved their operations. These caf√© owners have experienced firsthand how Dripos eliminates headaches and allows them to focus on what they do best‚Äîserving coffee.

In sum, Dripos is revolutionizing how coffee shops operate by providing a unified software solution that simplifies everyday tasks while enhancing customer experience. If you‚Äôre in the coffee business, it might just be the only tool you‚Äôll ever need.

For more insights and to explore their offerings, check out their website at [dripos.com](https://dripos.com).
